---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
drone_1 <- read.csv(here("drone_data", "drone_test_1_rformat.csv")) %>% 
  dplyr::select(Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Latitude))

drone_2 <- read.csv(here("drone_data", "drone_test_2_rformat.csv")) %>% 
  dplyr::select(Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Latitude)) %>% 
  filter(Altitude > 40) #these are results that would otherwise have been filtered out as 2D fixes, so I will not include them in the error distribution

drone_data <- bind_rows(drone_1, drone_2)

#mean(drone_data$Altitude)
#sd(drone_data$Altitude)
write.csv(drone_data, here("drone_data", "drone_data_combined.csv"))
```
